events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking shows no updates, and I'm very disappointed with the delay.
The customer's complaint indicates a delivery delay, with no recent tracking updates and extended waiting time.
Assigning this case to the delivery support team to investigate the shipping delay and provide assistance.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear your order has not arrived yet. I’m here to help and will look into the shipping status for you.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address to help us track your package more accurately?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the shipping address is 45 Maple Street, Springfield. Please check the status for me.

Thank you for the details. We checked with the courier, and your package is delayed due to unforeseen transit issues. We expect delivery within 3 days and will provide expedited shipping at no extra cost.
Thanks for the update and for expediting the shipping. I appreciate your help in resolving this quickly.
We have arranged for expedited shipping and will monitor your order closely to ensure you receive it within the next 3 days.
We are following up to confirm that your order has been delivered. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
As we have not heard back and your delivery should now be complete, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
